divs: sighting detailspretty much been seeing these cigar shaped white objects with no wings and a propellar.... thinking they are uav but i did see one vanish instantly yesterday...this is why im posting my pix of them now..a guy just reported similar things *(link moved to additional evidence section below--cms\sg). feel free to get ahold of me, i have quite a few unknown pix and would love to sort them out! moved rights to left, appeared to have no wings, flew straight as an arrow, no contrails what so ever, silent
